data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Jehamalar, E. Eyarin, Chandra, Kailash, Polhemus, Dan A. (2019): Review of the Mesovelia horvathi species complex (Hemiptera: Gerromorpha: Mesoveliidae), with the description of seven new species from India. Zootaxa 4651 (3): 471-496, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4651.3.4|59 occurrences
